SELECT A.*, B.* FROM ( SELECT t2.rnum as num, t2.review_seq as reviewSeq, t2.member_id as memberId, t2.review_fk as reviewFk, t2.div, t2.contents, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD')=TO_CHAR(t2.reg_dt,'YYYY/MM/DD') THEN TO_CHAR(t2.reg_dt,'HH24:MI') ELSE TO_CHAR(t2.reg_dt,'YYYY/MM/DD') END as regDt, t2.mod_id as modId, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD')=TO_CHAR(t2.mod_dt,'YYYY/MM/DD') THEN TO_CHAR(t2.mod_dt,'HH24:MI') ELSE TO_CHAR(t2.mod_dt,'YYYY/MM/DD') END as modDt, t2.star_score as starScore, t2.total_review AS totalReviews, t2.avg_star AS avgStars FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rnum, t1.* FROM ( SELECT r.review_seq, r.member_id, r.review_fk, r.div, r.contents, r.reg_dt, r.mod_id, r.mod_dt, s.star_score ,( SELECT TRUNC(AVG(star_score),1) FROM star WHERE store_seq = r.review_fk ) avg_star ,( SELECT count(*) FROM review WHERE review_fk = r.review_fk ) total_review FROM review r, star s WHERE r.review_fk = #{reviewFk} AND r.review_fk = s.store_seq AND r.member_id = s.member_id ORDER BY r.mod_dt DESC )t1
WHERE ROWNUM <= (#{pageSize} * (#{pageNum} - 1) + #{pageSize}) )t2 WHERE rnum >= (#{pageSize} * (#{pageNum} - 1) + 1) ) A CROSS JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) total_cnt FROM review r, star s WHERE r.review_fk = #{reviewFk} AND r.review_fk = s.store_seq AND r.member_id = s.member_id )B

SELECT review_seq, member_id, review_fk, div, contents, TO_CHAR(reg_dt,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') reg_dt, mod_id, TO_CHAR(mod_dt,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') mod_dt FROM review WHERE review_seq = #{reviewSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE review SET contents = #{contents}, mod_id = #{modId}, mod_dt = SYSDATE WHERE review_seq = #{reviewSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review ( review_seq, member_id, review_fk, div, contents, reg_dt, mod_id, mod_dt ) VALUES ( #{reviewSeq}, #{memberId}, #{reviewFk}, #{div}, #{contents}, SYSDATE, #{modId}, SYSDATE )
